title: Did Tiffany Cockers start as a slave meet?
subtitle: Tiffany and his partners never made or sold the slave collar, and the viral image of the slave collar is not from an exhibition at the National Museum of African-American History and Culture in Washington, D.C.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Photo by Tiffany's slave collar at the National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, D.C.
